messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Oh, that's the answer
messages.msgSnippet: ... I don t know. How many Buddhist retreats are there in N. CA? That would be a cool coincidence. Life is good. ~Mary
messages.messageBody:
>It isn't near Mt. Shasta is it?
>My dh has a cousin at the Mt. Shasta abbey.
>Zensho Roberson....


I don't know. How many Buddhist retreats are there in N. CA? That would be a
cool coincidence.

Life is good.
~Mary

messages.subject: Oh, that's the answer
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/17/03 1:07:11 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/17/03 1:07:11 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
I talked to his mom yesterday. At 19 he has just been accepted to study at a
Buddhist retreat Northern CA. He has found himself again. It's inspiring. >>

It isn't near Mt. Shasta is it?
My dh has a cousin at the Mt. Shasta abbey.
Zensho Roberson....

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.subject: Oh, that's the answer
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/15/03 3:50:09 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes: Blue Skies, ... I love this closing! So peaceful.

In a message dated 2/15/03 3:50:09 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< >Blue Skies,
>-Robin-

I love this closing! So peaceful. :-) >>

Yeah, me too.
I picture Robin up in her little plane, cruising the blue skies....:)

Ren
